short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search IPs, Domains, URLs, hashes or encoded text and IOCs on various services

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AddonCyber is a simple open-source browser extension to assist SOC teams, cybersecurity researchers and analysts in day-to-day threat intelligence and security operations. Using a browser, highlight the indicator: IP, URL, domain, file hash, CVE number, base64 encoded text, and opt to search various threat intel services for the IOC, search for a CVE, decode base64, etc
